channel.title: Client error
channel.description:
i logged in to my server after adding some recolours into my server and i tryed to spawn them when i did it my client froze and i got ths error
[IMG]http://i41.tinypic.com/2n8vrr9.jpg[/img]
now every time i try to log on that acc i get a black screen with 2loading please wait" and the same error message
can any 1 tell me what i did wrong and how i can fix this :S?

item.title: Client error
item.dc:creator: @nemoigescape nemoigescape
item.description:
@nemoigescape wrote:

i still get the same problem when i used your code but my old code was this

@ECHO OFF
TITLE Client
color 0a
JAVA -Xmx500m EGUI
PAUSE

i have no ideea if that is any help?

Read full topic
